attributes.action: Protect the UK borders fully before sending our sons to protect foreign borders.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is a shameful hypocrisy to allow open borders at home and permit infiltration by people of any/every other nation with no consideration of potential risk to our own people. Then introduce a narrative where our own sons should be sent overseas to risk their lives for someone else's border.
attributes.background: We the people, are entitled to expect our representatives to put our safety first. Certainly before the safety of other nations involved in conflicts. We call for our borders to be protected at all costs. Only when that is secure, should we consider deploying troops overseas.

rejection.details: We are not sure how you would like the UK borders to be protected.
